1/* mpc_proj -- projection of a complex number onto the Riemann sphere.
2

13WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS

18along with this program. If not, see http://www.gnu.org/licenses/ .

21#include "mpc-impl.h"
22
23int
24mpc_proj (mpc_ptr a, mpc_srcptr b, mpc_rnd_t rnd)
25{
26 if (mpc_inf_p (b)) {
27 /* infinities project to +Inf +i* copysign(0.0, cimag(z)) */
28 mpfr_set_inf (mpc_realref (a), +1);
29 mpfr_set_zero (mpc_imagref (a), (mpfr_signbit (mpc_imagref (b)) ? -1 : 1));
30 return MPC_INEX (0, 0);
31 }
32 else
33 return mpc_set (a, b, rnd);
34}
35
